subject: World Baseball Classic
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The South Koreans ran the bases aggressively and hammered baseballs out of Dodger Stadium as they beat the Venezuelans, 10-2, in the W.B.C. semifinals.
snippet: The South Koreans ran the bases aggressively and hammered baseballs out of Dodger Stadium as they beat the Venezuelans, 10-2, in the W.B.C. semifinals.
